Enchantment 6

Heat from Hell
Combat
F4
spell id [id]: 925
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 6
casting time [casttime]: 225%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 200-
gems required [gemcost]: 2F
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Heat
The entire battlefield is struck by heat worse than that of the hottest of deserts. This heat soon renders all units on the battlefield unconscious, after which death is certain. This spell is most effective in warm provinces.
